title: Millionaire Manufacturer(百万富翁制造商)
body:
New lottery item: Millionaire Maker (100% fair and transparent third party drawing)
The 14-hour period will stop selling 1 hour in advance
Each purchase is assigned a number incremented by +1 each time
The lottery is 24 hours closing price (BTC+ETH+BNB) after the closing price of three integers multiplied/purchase lottery last number of the remaining number for the winning number.
Winning activities 90% of the prize money,10% to the platform combustion buyback
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
新增彩票项目:百万富翁制造商(第三方开奖100%公平透明化)
14小时一期 提前1小时停止销售
每购买一次分配一个号码 每次+1递增
开奖为24小时收盘价格(BTC+ETH+BNB)收盘价格后三位整数相乘/购买彩票最后一个号码 的余数为中奖号码.
中奖活动奖金90%,10%交给平台燃烧回购
author: 0x1E1669Cf259f986b2e0df3e8B9614eae0B631B92
